input_args.passage: 'American | The greatest fiction books since 1950(1 to 50) determined by 130 lists and articles from various critics, authors and experts.'
input_args.claim: 'From the second source, we learn that Elie Wiesel is a Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he teaches “Literature of Memory.” He also served as the Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
